text: Lyudi dolzhny byt' spravedlivymi k sirotam, i pust' oni boyatsya, kak te, kotoryye, yesli by ostavlyali posle sebya slaboye potomstvo, boyalis' by, chto yemu pridotsya stradat' ot nespravedlivosti, podobnoy toy, kotoraya mogla by svershit'sya po otnosheniyu k sirotam. Pust' lyudi boyatsya Allakha v svoyom otnoshenii k sirotam i pust' govoryat tvordoye slovo istiny i spravedlivosti
